title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 820.4 - Driving of commercial motor vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 820.4 - Driving of commercial motor vehicles

State Regulations
(a) The Commissioner of

Transportation adopts Part
392
of Title 49 of the Code of Federal Regulations
with the same force and effect as though herein fully set forth at
length. (b) No motor carrier may
operate, or allow a driver to operate, a commercial motor vehicle while such
motor carrier is rated "unsatisfactory" pursuant to Part
385
of Title 49 of the

Code of Federal Regulations. (c) No
motor carrier may operate, or allow a driver to operate, a commercial motor
vehicle in a manner that is inconsistent with how it is
registered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
820.4

Adopted

New

York State Register June 24, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 25, eff. 7/1/2015

Amended

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
